    • 方法详细资料

      • convertToMutable

        public static Bitmap convertToMutable(Context context,
                      Bitmap inBitmap)
        Change a bitmap to mutable.
        参数:
        context -
        inBitmap - The bitmap need to change
        返回:
        if success, return a mutable bitmap, others return the old bitmap.

      • getBitmapSize

        public static BitmapUtils.Size getBitmapSize(String url)
        Get bitmap size, width and height.
        参数:
        url -
        返回:

      • toRoundCorner

        public static Bitmap toRoundCorner(Bitmap bitmap,
                   int ratio)
        Make a round corner bitmap
        参数:
        bitmap - Source bitmap.
        ratio - Corner radius ratio of Diameter accounting. when it's value is 2, the bitmap which returned is a circle.
        返回:
        the round corner bitmap. null if input bitmap is invalid.
